channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mild Weather Keeps U.S. Natural Gas Under Pressure
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures extended a negative streak as near-term weather patterns remain mild and inventory surpluses are expected to increase.

item.title: Big Pharma's Obesity Bonanza Faces New Tests
item.description: The next few months will be crucial for obesity players Eli Lilly, Novo Nordisk and Amgen.

item.title: Phunware’s stock slides after CFO steps down and poll puts Harris ahead in Iowa
item.description: Shares of Phunware Inc. are down 5.1% after the mobile-advertising company tied to former President Donald Trump’s 2020 campaign said Chief Financial ...

item.title: Oil prices rise over 2% after OPEC+ delays production increase by another month
item.description: Oil futures saw strong gains Monday after the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries said members would wait yet another month before begin...

item.title: Trump-Harris odds whipsaw on dueling polls, but you should ignore the noise
item.description: Political polling and betting markets have a long history of error.

item.title: Dollar Weakens as Markets Seem to Price Out Tariff Risk
item.description: The dollar fell ahead of the U.S. presidential election, with expectations regarding trade tariffs likely moving FX markets, Goldman Sachs economists ...

item.title: ‘This election season has worn me out’: I love this country, but I’m no better off financially than I was 10 years ago. Why vote?
item.description: “I’m in my mid-40s, female, single, and working a nine-to-five job.”

item.title: Stocks Unchanged and Bonds Rally as Tight Election Looms
item.description: Stocks were little changed as traders scrambled to adjust positions as Tuesday’s presidential election looms.

item.title: China's Coming Stimulus Is Necessary but Likely Insufficient
item.description: Beijing looks set to do just enough to stabilize the situation, but not enough to spur growth.

item.title: Viking Therapeutics’ weight-loss pill shows ‘great outcome’ in trial
item.description: The stock, which enjoys the unusual position of having all buy ratings from the 13 analysts offering coverage on FactSet, has been on a tear this year...
